reviewText: Loved this DVD set. If you are looking for a good, well-rounded conference on Biblical Prophesy, this is it. All the speakers were excellent, and since watching this I have bought several of their books or books they recommended during the conference. (Son of Hamas by Mosab Hassan Youcef, Muslim Mafia recommended by Gen (r) Boykin, several Joel Rosenberg books) I have been encouraging everyone to buy this! Greg Laurie put together an excellent conference.

The DVD material was great.
There were 2 DVD's in the case and one of the plastic pages that hold the dvd ws broken.

Very informative in a way that you can understand. My husband has watched it several times and learns new information each time. I am buying several more sets to give as gifts.

If you have questions about the end times, this has the answers.
